casebody.data:
KEVIN GUESS v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 21011)

Lavery, C. J., and Spear and Dranginis, Js.

Submitted on briefs April 3 officially released May 14, 2002 Per Curiam.

A review of the record and briefs shows that the trial court did not abuse its discretion in denying certification to appeal. See Owens v. Commissioner of Correction, 63 Conn. App. 829, 830-31, 779 A.2d 165, cert. denied, 258 Conn. 905, 782 A.2d 138 (2001).

The appeal is dismissed.
